Support Your Hybrid Workforce

When work can be anywhere, the way we communicate and collaborate also changes. How do you keep people connected? How do you retain the culture of your business? How do you ensure business continuity in times of rapid change?

Achieve your vision with our expertise

We design, integrate, and support your hybrid workspace with a holistic approach that will help nurture employee engagement, facilitate a more dynamic way of working, and help you reach new levels of performance. Our extensive solution portfolio and ecosystem of print products, communication tools, and workspace management will bring your digital workspace to greater heights. We have the expertise to help you build and scale your hybrid workplace.

According to Microsoft, 66% of businesses are already rethinking and redesigning their office space to meet the needs of a hybrid workplace and workforce.

Ricoh’s Hybrid Workplace know-how ensures that your team—physical or remote—has everything they need to work.

Creating the best of both worlds

To retain the best of both your physical and online workplace, you need the expertise, strategy, and technology to deploy tools that can connect people and tools seamlessly, enable productive collaboration, and manage your physical workspace.

Let’s build your hybrid workplace

Not only does your hybrid workplace solutions need to deliver what your employees want—flexibility, agility, and mobility—but they also need to ensure business continuity through security, compliance, and standardised procedures. We understand the complexity in deploying hybrid working solutions that meet the requirements of your new digital reality. Our teams are dedicated to help you embark on a new journey by developing a thorough understanding of your workforce, your current technology stack, and what is needed to achieve your hybrid workplace vision.

Our Hybrid Workplace Solutions

Connect & Collaborate

Deliver excellent user experience that allows effortless connectivity and collaboration across teams, workspaces, and geographics. Create better work experiences and increase employee engagement with world-class voice, video, and interactive display technologies.

Discover now

Workspace Management

Enable the workplace of tomorrow, today by unleashing the full potential of your workspace. Maintain and improve your operational functions and workspaces with a dynamic space management tool.

Smart Devices

Don’t let your team get bogged down by a fractured physical-digital experience. From tablets and videoconferencing to intelligent printers and the Internet, empower your people to work seamlessly and more effectively in a safe and secure environment.
